detail_desc: Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Fitted jumper in a rib knit with a stand-up collar, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports bra in soft stretch fabric with a nursing function. Opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, racer back with a cut-out section and reinforced shoulder straps. Wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless. Extra firm support.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ribbed hems.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Top with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless top in stretch jersey with a round neckline, concealed buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a straight-cut hem.
Jacquard-weave jacket with a collar, rhinestone-embellished buttons down the front and long, cuffed puff sleeves. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Imitation suede espadrilles with open sides, an adjustable strap with a metal fastener at the back and a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton canvas linings, jute insoles and rubber soles.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, a lace racer back and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Metal fastener at the front.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar and press-studs at the back of the neck. Long, puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck body in soft, ribbed jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a fine knit containing some wool decorated with imitation pearls. High collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin court shoes decorated with sparkly stones. Pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Thin metal chain necklace decorated with small pendants. Adjustable length 42-49 cm.
Monkstraps with toe caps, a front fastening with a concealed elastic gore and adjustable metal buckles at the side. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3 cm.
Short dress in woven fabric with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, short, wide sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Flatlock seam at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft modal and cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in woven fabric with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Top in soft, washed cotton jersey with long sleeves, a chest pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, short raglan sleeves and twisted side seams.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter 1.2 cm to 2.5 cm.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a wide, sewn-in tie belt.

Short skirt in a viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave with covered elastication at the waist, ties at the front, patch front pockets and fake back pockets. Wide, cotton jersey panel at the waist for best fit.
Long earrings in metal with sequins. Length 9 cm.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery at the top, long sleeves and a flared skirt.
Pull-on trousers in a textured weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with short slits at the hems.

Dress in woven fabric with a motif, collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, and long sleeves with a tab and button. Pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in imitation leather with a collar, covered press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, short sleeves and a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Knot detail at the front and a metal fastener at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length, gently fitted dress in a viscose weave with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a concealed zip at the back, long sleeves, decorative stitching in a contrasting colour and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Soft, non-wired bra in cotton jersey with lace details. Padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Treggings in sturdy, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Reversible sun hat in cotton. One side with an all-over print and appliqué and the other in a solid colour. Ties under the chin. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Loose-fitting strappy top in an airy satin weave with a V-neck.
Double-breasted jacket in a checked cotton weave with a gently rounded collar, sewn-on shoulder tabs and long sleeves with a tab at the cuffs. Long pleat at the back, and side pockets. Partly lined.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, side stripes and ribbed hems.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Anklets in different designs of thin metal chain. Adjustable length.
Chinos in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Chinos in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, rib-knit viscose jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.

Round-necked blouse in an airy weave with beaded embroidery at the front and down the sleeves. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waistband, side pockets and rounded hems. Contrasting colour stripes and trims at the sides and hems.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.

Long dress in organza with toning embroidery. Stand-up collar with narrow ties, a V-neck opening at the top and long raglan balloon sleeves with smocking at the cuffs. Decorative seam under the bust and inset panels at the sides with gathers and a small frill trim to create added volume in the skirt. Lined with a short, V-neck underdress in airy jersey. The polyester content of the outer fabric of the dress is partly recycled. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Fine-knit, V-neck sweater vest in soft cotton.
Thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Large scarf in a soft, checked weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 65x200 cm.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Set with an Alice band decorated with a fake hair fringe, ears and a unicorn horn, and a hair elastic with fake hair.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with platform soles, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5 cm, platform front 3 cm.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Shorter blouse in jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck and wrapover front with a wide flounced trim that continues around the back of the neck. Long sleeves with frill-trimmed buttoned cuffs, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and covered buttons to the hem.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side. Satin linings and insoles, low heels and fluted soles.
Ribbed vest top in soft cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the armholes and hem.
